src/app/app.component.ts.content: import { Component, ViewEncapsulation, ViewChild } from "@angular/core"; import { SwiperComponent } from "swiper/angular"; // import Swiper core and required modules import SwiperCore, { Navigation, Thumbs } from "swiper/core"; // install Swiper modules SwiperCore.use([Navigation, Thumbs]); @Component({ selector: "app-swiper-example", template: ` `, styleUrls: ["./app.components.scss"], encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None, }) export class AppComponent { thumbsSwiper: any; }
